MovementSpeed.Description: Regular movement speed of the camera.

FastMovementSpeed.Description: Movement speed of the camera when the 'Shift' key is held down.

ZoomSpeed.Description: Movement speed of the camera with the scroll wheel.

FastZoomSpeed.Description: Movement speed of the camera with the scroll wheel when the 'Shift' key is held down.

TiltSpeed.Description: The speed Z and X keys tilt the camera at.

FastTiltSpeed.Description: The speed Z and X keys tilt the camera at when the 'Shift' key is held down.

HideHUD.Description: Whether if the HUD should be hidden or not during the FreeCam mode.
